title: Life on our planet not centered around us: Bruce Mau
itunes:title: Life on our planet not centered around us: Bruce Mau
description: “Everything we are doing right now, we don’t know how to do. That’s the magical thing about design.” Designer Bruce Mau joined DAC’s Jen Masengarb to discuss Massive Change Network’s current projects and his ground-breaking collaborations with leading architects, museums, and companies. Mau speaks about caring for our planet and argues this is the best time in human history to be alive.

Mau speaks about caring for our planet and argues this is the best time in human history to be alive.
